botDescription: We offer an intelligent chatbot, trained to talk to autistic children to help them get through their fears!
contributionsDescription: Friendy offers an easy and effective tool for professionals to contribute to the chatbot
homeDescription: Friendy is a platform for autistic children to let them talk freely and help them pass their issues.
homeHeader: friendy is the friend you need!
label: label
loginError: please check your username and password and try again!
passwordLength: password must contain at least 8 characters
patternsRequired: you must add at least one pattern
patternsResponsesLanguageMatch: you must add a response for each set of patterns with the same language
responsesRequired: you must add at least one response
signupError: an error occurred while signing up, please try again!
title: title
validateContributionDescription: press accept if you want to validate the selected contribution
invalidateContributionDescription: press accept if you want to invalidate the selected contribution
deleteDescription: press accept if you want to delete the selected item
isTraining: the model is training, please wait until it finishes
noModel: there is no trained model. Train a model to be able to use the Chatbot
lastTrain: last time you trained a model is on
enableModelDescription: press accept if you want to enable the selected model
setModelTagDescription: press accept if you want to update the selected model's tag
creator: creator
validateUserDescription: press accept if you want to validate the selected user
invalidateUserDescription: press accept if you want to invalidate the selected user
